page.title: 05RECREATION Cont.
page.content: beach so when you go swimming you have to be careful of the hooks. In the middle of the beach is a huge rock which I often climb. Whitsands Bay is a popular recreational spot for those who live in our area. It is about 10 miles distant on the south coast of Cornwall. The River Tamar forms the eastern boundary of our block at Cargreen and Skinham Point. The river is used for several forms of boating and fishing. The River Tamar is the boundary between Devon and Cornwall. There is little swimming in the river because it is used for sewage disposal and therefore polluted.
